name: Interfectorem (itch) (whapy)
description:
CONTROLS: 

MOVE WASD or ARROWS

SHOOT K or X,

DASH with SPACE

READ DIALOGUE FOR CONTEXT (WE DIDN'T HAVE TIME FOR A CUTSCENE).

We know you're the best hit man in this sick world,

 We need you. 

We´re C.O.L.O.P.E,an "association" I'm sure you've heard of us... ,

 look. we've got access to the purgatory, which now is full of crap,

 Angels and demons have been killing each other for centuries, but now, they started to just ignore themselves, they live among each other, and we have no chance of getting out of there alive. 

So I guess you're the only one that can take this job, get rid of these mother truckers...

 You'll have yo use these weapons, you can only kill demons with the celestial, and angels with the underworld gun. 

And oh yeah, you can only tolerate so much essence from each type of spirit, or whatever they are. 

We've got some supplies there, take them, I'm sure they'll make your life easier. 

Be sure to kill every monster in the portal room to access the next layer. 

I hope you have a good mission, we'll pay you a LOT of money if you get out of there alive.

*cough cough*, I mean you will get out of there alive, uhm... 

Good luck Mr. Arman.

This game still has stuff to be fixed and a bright future.
